remarks: A subtraction law:  Exchanging the subtrahend and the result of the subtracion.  (Contributed by BJ, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
addlsub.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
addlsub.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
addlsub.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
subexsub $p |- ( ph -> ( A = ( C - B ) <-> B = ( C - A ) ) ) $.
